results.name: Conquer Taiwan at Christmas 聖誕節來征服台灣吧
Flower Sort Puzzle - Color Sorting Game

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel iRIS Xe
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Wondows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel iRIS Xe
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space
